formats all transform input varieties to a canonical form
tests.code:
it('formats all transform input varieties to a canonical form', () => {
        expect(Matrix.formatTransforms({
          flip: true,
          skew: 5,
          scale: 5,
          originX: 5,
          originY: 5,
          positionX: 5,
          positionY: 5,
          translateX: 5,
          translateY: 5,
          relativeX: 5,
          relativeY: 5
        })).toEqual({
          scaleX: -5,
          scaleY: -5,
          skewX: 5,
          skewY: 5,
          shear: 0,
          theta: 0,
          rx: 5,
          ry: 5,
          tx: 5,
          ty: 5,
          ox: 5,
          oy: 5,
          px: 5,
          py: 5
        });
      });
